summary: Defines inâ€‘memory data models and helper utilities for the AWS Panorama service within the Moto library. Includes classes representing devices, application instances, packages, nodes, and a backend that implements create, read, update, delete, provisioning, and pagination operations, along with generic base model functionality for response formatting.
business_intent: Provides a mock implementation of the AWS Panorama APIs so that developers can test and develop applications that interact with Panorama resources (devices, packages, application instances, etc.) without accessing real AWS services.
